tweets.text:
Bu Ã§alÄ±ÅŸmanÄ±n temel bir dersi, Ã¶zerkliÄŸin model, kullanÄ±cÄ± ve Ã¼rÃ¼n tarafÄ±ndan birlikte inÅŸa edildiÄŸidir. YalnÄ±zca daÄŸÄ±tÄ±m Ã¶ncesi deÄŸerlendirmelerle tam olarak karakterize edilemez.

TÃ¼m detaylar ve geliÅŸtiriciler ile politika yapÄ±cÄ±lar iÃ§in Ã¶nerilerimiz blogda: https://t.co/CllNkMF4ZZ
tweets.originalText:
A central lesson of this work is that autonomy is co-constructed by the model, user, and product. It can't be fully characterized by pre-deployment evaluations alone.

For full details, and our recommendations to developers and policymakers, see the blog: https://t.co/CllNkMF4ZZ

tweets.text:
API'mizdeki araÃ§sal Ã§aÄŸrÄ±larÄ±n yaklaÅŸÄ±k %50'sini yazÄ±lÄ±m mÃ¼hendisliÄŸi oluÅŸturuyor, ancak diÄŸer sektÃ¶rlerde de yeni kullanÄ±m alanlarÄ± gÃ¶rÃ¼yoruz.

Risk ve Ã¶zerklik sÄ±nÄ±rlarÄ± geniÅŸledikÃ§e, daÄŸÄ±tÄ±m sonrasÄ± izleme temel hale geliyor. DiÄŸer model geliÅŸtiricileri bu araÅŸtÄ±rmayÄ± geniÅŸletmeye teÅŸvik ediyoruz. https://t.co/p8pOjgJPrh
tweets.originalText:
Software engineering makes up ~50% of agentic tool calls on our API, but we see emerging use in other industries. 

As the frontier of risk and autonomy expands, post-deployment monitoring becomes essential. We encourage other model developers to extend this research. https://t.co/p8pOjgJPrh

tweets.text:
API'mizdeki Ã§oÄŸu ajan eylemi dÃ¼ÅŸÃ¼k risklidir. AraÃ§ Ã§aÄŸrÄ±larÄ±nÄ±n %73'Ã¼nde insan kontrolÃ¼ var gibi gÃ¶rÃ¼nÃ¼yor ve yalnÄ±zca %0.8'i geri alÄ±namaz nitelikte.

Ancak sÄ±nÄ±r bÃ¶lgelerinde, ajanlarÄ±n gÃ¼venlik sistemleri, finansal iÅŸlemler ve Ã¼retim daÄŸÄ±tÄ±mlarÄ± Ã¼zerinde hareket ettiÄŸini gÃ¶rÃ¼yoruz (bazÄ±larÄ± deÄŸerlendirme olabilir). https://t.co/Jk3xXUKCpN
tweets.originalText:
Most agent actions on our API are low risk. 73% of tool calls appear to have a human in the loop, and only 0.8% are irreversible.

But at the frontier, we see agents acting on security systems, financial transactions, and production deployments (though some may be evals). https://t.co/Jk3xXUKCpN

tweets.text:
Claude Code ayrÄ±ca sorular sorarak durarak denetimi teÅŸvik ediyor.

KarmaÅŸÄ±k gÃ¶revlerde, Claude Code aÃ§Ä±klama iÃ§in, insanlarÄ±n onu bÃ¶ldÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼nden iki kattan daha fazla sÄ±klÄ±kta duraklÄ±yor. Modellerin belirsizliÄŸi tanÄ±masÄ±nÄ± Ã¶ÄŸretmek, Ã¶nemli ve yeterince takdir edilmeyen bir gÃ¼venlik Ã¶zelliÄŸi. https://t.co/IyOSahYEI4
tweets.originalText:
Claude Code also encourages oversight by stopping to ask questions.

On complex tasks, Claude Code pauses for clarification more than twice as often as humans interrupt it. Training models to recognize uncertainty is an important, under-appreciated safety property. https://t.co/IyOSahYEI4

tweets.text:
Ancak kesintiler deneyimle birlikte artÄ±yor. Yeni kullanÄ±cÄ±lar Claude Code'u etkileÅŸimlerin %5'inde keserken, daha deneyimli kullanÄ±cÄ±larda bu oran %9.

Bu, her eylemi onaylamaktan, gerektiÄŸinde yetki devredip mÃ¼dahale etmeye doÄŸru bir geÃ§iÅŸe iÅŸaret ediyor. https://t.co/SDaUXCl2Gv
tweets.originalText:
But interruptions also increase with experience. New users interrupt Claude Code in 5% of turns, compared to 9% for more experienced users.

This suggests a shift from approving each action to delegating and interrupting when needed. https://t.co/SDaUXCl2Gv
